tags.name: Nothing
tags.description: Games that don't boot at all, not displaying an initial black screen with a FPS counter.

tags.name: Bootable
tags.description: Games that boot but display nothing more than a black screen with a FPS counter.

tags.name: Intro
tags.description: Games that display any image on screen but doesn't reach to menus.

tags.name: Menu
tags.description: Games that get into menu but can't enter Ingame.

tags.name: Ingame -
tags.description: Games that go ingame but have major issues that prevents it from going further early on.

tags.name: Ingame +
tags.description: Games that go far ingame but have glitches that render the game unplayable or have non-playable performance.

tags.name: Playable
tags.description: Games that can be played from start to finish with playable performance and no game breaking glitches.
